titleStmt.title: To the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England, Scotland and Ireland. The humble petition of Nathaniel Iones of Bridgewater, in the county of Sommerset, clerk.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Nathaniel, of Bridgewater.

notesStmt.note: Protesting against the illegality of the sequestration of his estates.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
